articles.content:

articles.title: Fiorentina arrive in Edinburgh with a £50m attacking weapon, studies on Hearts and a plan to force errors - Edinburgh News
articles.description: Seeking to win away from home for the first time since April, Fiorentina coach Vincenzo Italiano believes Hearts can be forced into errors at Tynecastle Park.
articles.content: The 44-year-old needs a result in Edinburgh to ignite his clubs Europa Conference League campaign after a run of just one win in ten games. They have taken just one point from two Group A matches and… [+2808 chars]
